d - The variable is used to define the type of the function pointer that is returned by fn2(). However, it is not used directly in the code.
fn1 - The variable is not used directly in the code, but its address is taken and used to initialize the vector size of the variable d.

sizeof(long) - This is a built-in function that is used to determine the size of a long integer. It is not used directly in the code.
